insights.title: Consistent High Performer: Retention
insights.narrative: Retention consistently shows strong headcount performance across multiple contexts including Attrition/Retention, demonstrating reliable excellence across 11 different dimensions.

supporting_facts.description: In the Bar showing 2 by Attrition/Retention, Retention has the highest value at 244.0, which is 70% above the average of 143.5.
Across all series in the Bar comparing headcount by Attrition/Retention, the highest value overall is 391.0 for 3 in the Retention category, which is 113% above the overall average.

In the Bar showing 1 by Attrition/Retention, Retention has the highest value at 219.0, which is 59% above the average of 138.0.
Across all series in the Bar comparing headcount by Attrition/Retention, the highest value overall is 388.0 for 3 in the Retention category, which is 111% above the overall average.
In the Bar showing 1 by Attrition/Retention, Retention has the highest value at 55.0, which is 38% above the average of 40.0.
Across all series in the Bar comparing headcount by Attrition/Retention, the highest value overall is 766.0 for 3 in the Retention category, which is 317% above the overall average.
In the Bar showing headcount by Attrition/Retention, Retention has the highest value at 1233.0, which is 68% above the average of 735.0.
